name: Project K11
description: Project K11 is a fast-paced first-person shooter (FPS) game that immerses players in a modern warfare setting. The game features both single-player and multiplayer modes, allowing players to engage in tactical combat against other players from around the world. The game's multiplayer mode supports a variety of game modes, including free for all, team deathmatch, and capture the flag. Players can choose from a wide variety of weapons, including snipers, sub machine guns, pistols, and grenades, that will create a realistic and immersive gaming experience.
